QuestData.Title: Fresh out of the Grave
QuestData.Description: $n!$b$bRise, $n!$b$bWelcome back to the realm of the living. With the blessing and power of the Dark Lady, I have freed you from death's grip.$b$bYou are no slave, $n. You are free to follow whatever path you choose from here. If you choose to serve the Dark Lady Sylvanas, I recommend you speak with Undertaker Mordo. You will find him behind me, in the graveyard.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Undertaker Mordo at the Deathknell Graves in Tirisfal Glades.
